resource: 1003129.vtc=true 1003129.1002622.description=Driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s buzzer sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seat belt is not fastened.The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle reaches a speed of 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003129.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003129.description=Driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelt buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s buzzer sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seat belt is not fastened.The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle reaches a speed of 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds.
